messages.content: Choose a sunny spot with well-drained soil.  Sow seeds directly outdoors after the last frost (around April/May in London), 1 inch deep and 6 inches apart. Keep the soil moist until germination.  Alternatively, start seeds indoors 6-8 weeks before the last frost. Thin seedlings to 12-18 inches apart once established. Water regularly, especially during dry spells.

context: Last topic: how to plant a sunflower
